data.eml:eml: Redescription of Parapercis punctata (Cuvier, 1829) and status of Neosillago Castelnau, 1875 and its type species Neosillago marmorata Castelnau, 1875 (Perciformes: Pinguipedidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hsuan-Ching (2013): Redescription of Parapercis punctata (Cuvier, 1829) and status of Neosillago Castelnau, 1875 and its type species Neosillago marmorata Castelnau, 1875 (Perciformes: Pinguipedidae). Zootaxa 3736 (3): 291-299, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3736.3.7
